definitions.definition: An Assyrian protective deity , often depicted as having the head of a human , the body of an ox or lion , and the wings of a bird .
A representation – especially a statue – of a lamassu.

main_definition: An Assyrian protective deity , often depicted as having the head of a human , the body of an ox or lion , and the wings of a bird .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A representation – especially a statue – of a lamassu.
